title: Delft AI Labs
description: A TU Delft-wide initiative fostering interdisciplinary AI research through dedicated labs combining AI expertise with domain knowledge across faculties.

title: Future Libraries Lab
description: A joint initiative with the Royal Library of The Netherlands (KB) exploring how AI and data science can transform library services, cultural heritage access, and knowledge dissemination.

title: CrowdTruth: Crowd Computing for Semantic Interpretation
description: EU-funded project developing methods and tools for harnessing crowd intelligence to capture and leverage semantic ambiguity in annotation tasks.

title: HUMAN-AI: Human-Centered Trustworthy AI
description: Horizon Europe project developing frameworks and tools for building AI systems that are transparent, fair, and accountable, with humans at the center of the design process.
